hero.headline: Frontend Developer focused on building modern, interactive web experiences.
hero.subheadline: I build clean, scalable, and visually engaging interfaces using React and modern frontend tools.

about.shortBio: I build frontend experiences where design, motion, and clean React code meet.
description: I didn’t come to frontend development just to write code — I came for the intersection between design and logic.
I enjoy turning visual ideas into interactive, well-structured React interfaces that feel smooth, clear, and intentional.
For me, a good frontend isn’t only about features, it’s about how users feel while using the product.

howIWork: Break designs down into clear, reusable React components.
Care deeply about UI clarity, motion, and interaction details.
Write code that’s easy to read, reason about, and extend.
Even personal projects are treated like real products.
values: Learning through building, not just watching

projects.title: Crusto
projects.focus: Mobile-first UX, cart state management, and clear ordering flow.

intent.short: Explores user flow and ordering logic in service-based platforms.
intent.details: Built to better understand service-based websites, especially restaurant platforms, focusing on user flow, ordering experience, and clear presentation of business information.

responsibilities: Built responsive UI pages for menu browsing and ordering flow.
Designed layouts with clear visual hierarchy.

projects.title: Optics Store
projects.tagline: A full-featured optics store platform with virtual try-on experience.
projects.focus: Production-ready e-commerce platform combining product sales, services, and interactive UI.

intent.short: Built for a real optical center to manage sales, repairs, and doctor-based discounts.
intent.details: Designed and developed as a production-ready optics store platform allowing users to browse and buy glasses, try them virtually, request repairs, and apply for prescription-based discounts, while providing admins with full control over products, orders, and approvals.

responsibilities: Built responsive and scalable frontend using Next.js App Router.
Implemented virtual try-on experience per product and color.
Integrated authentication, database, and storage using Supabase.
Developed cart, orders, repairs, and doctor discount workflows.
Focused on clean UI, smooth animations, and maintainable architecture.

projects.title: Gallery
projects.tagline: A digital home for artists and art lovers.
projects.focus: Scalable UI architecture, content-heavy layouts, and scroll-based animations.

intent.short: Connects artists, studios, and art lovers in one digital space.
intent.details: Created to provide a unified platform where artists can showcase and sell their work, explore job opportunities, and connect with studios, while allowing art lovers and collectors to discover visual inspiration and creative talent in one place.

responsibilities: Built reusable React components with a scalable structure.
Implemented responsive layouts and smooth UI interactions.
Handled API integration, loading, and error states.
